title: Create a Therapy Plan of Care
description: Following an initial evaluation, an occupational therapist needs to create a plan of care for a new patient.

tasks.description: Open the patient's initial evaluation note.
tasks.expected_outcome: Therapist reviews their findings from the first visit.

tasks.description: Create a new 'Plan of Care' document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Therapist opens the specific template for a plan of care.

tasks.description: Document the patient's long-term goals, short-term goals, and the planned frequency and duration of therapy, then sign the plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive plan of care is created, which will guide future sessions and is required for insurance authorization.
